Announcing Azure Synapse Analytics public preview
Earlier this week, Microsoft announced that Azure Synapse Analytics, the next generation of Azure SQL Data warehouse, is now available for public preview. Our August release has another hotly anticipated feature from the Microsoft Business Application Summit, grouping.
